name: Algon Trade
description: ALG is the native token that powers the entire Algon Trade ecosystem. It connects our algorithmic strategies, vaults, and partner infrastructure into one efficient system. ALG serves as a utility, incentive, and governance asset — giving holders direct exposure to the platform’s performance and growth. It provides access to advanced trading products and future ecosystem benefits. As Algon Trade expands and its vaults generate higher returns, the value of ALG reflects this growth, creating a sustainable link between algorithmic efficiency and capital performance. In essence, ALG is not just a token, it’s the core mechanism aligning the interests of users, partners, and the protocol itself.
